text: That's How We Do It is the only studio album by Trailer Choir. The album was released on March 16, 2018. ==Track listing== # "That's How We Do It" – 2:47 # "Better With A Beer" – 2:57 # "Ice Cold Summer (Remix) (featuring Colt Ford)" – 3:22 # "She's Playing Hard To Forget" – 3:09 # "I Likes The Cougs" – 3:26 # "She's Comin' In Hot" – 3:21 # "Love Me First" – 4:11 # "Drinkin' Bourbon" – 3:12 # "The Way I Remember You" – 3:10 # "Put It On My Tab" – 3:14 # "Take It To The House" – 2:55 ==References== Category:2018 albums
title: That's How We Do It
